fluff: Blood-soaked gladiators in dented armour, acrobatic duellists with darting swords who carve their legends with steel and grit.
title: Squire (L), Warrior (N), Knave (C)

specialTalents.name: Mighty Deed.
specialTalents.description: If you have an advantage on attack, you can forfeit this advantage and declare mighty deed. If attack hits, you can add an effect to attack: push back, trip, entangle an enemy, temporarily blind them, defensive deed or precision shots and so on.

specialTalents.name: Weapon Mastery.
specialTalents.description: Choose one type of weapon, such as longswords. You gain +1 to attack and damage with that weapon type. In addition, add half your level to these rolls (round down).

specialTalents.name: Grit.
specialTalents.description: Choose Strength or Dexterity. You have advantage on checks of that type to overcome an opposing force, such as kicking open a stuck door (Strength) or slipping free of rusty chains (Dexterity).

talents.talent: Gain Weapon Mastery with one additional weapon
+2 to Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution score
Choose one kind of armor. You get +1 AC from that armor
Choose a talent or +2 points to distribute to ability scores

reward.name: Human Stronghold.
reward.value: Upon reaching the title of Lord/Lady, Chieftain or Warlord, a fighter may establish or build a Castle (for lord/lady), Keep (for chieftain) or Bastion (for warlord). When the construction is complete, a number of followers will arrive to serve.
